<Text: The Man Booker Prize for Fiction (formerly known as the Booker-McConnell Prize and commonly known simply as the Booker Prize) is a literary prize awarded each year for the best original novel, written in the English language and published in the UK.>
Triplets:<The Man Booker Prize
1:
<Text: Booker Prize:  The winner of the Man Booker Prize is generally assured international renown and success; therefore, the prize is of great significance for the book trade.>
Triplets:<Booker Prize
